unittitle_ssm: Martin L. Severe collection of first day covers
abstract_ssm: The collection consists of 142 U.S. first day covers with Brooklyn-related subjects issued during the period 1951-2014.  The first day cover subjects include the 100th anniversary of the opening of the Brooklyn Bridge, the Brooklyn Dodgers and New York Yankees baseball rivalry, the Battle of Brooklyn, the opening of the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge, U.S. Representative Shirley Chisholm, and the poet Marianne Moore.
